The LCLC offers multiple professional development opportunities for LCSL faculty and graduate students.           LCSL 505  Teaching Professional Development Workshop, open to all LCSL graduate students and is taught every semester!             Chicago Language Symposium  Partner annual initiative with Northwestern University, the University of Chicago, and DePaul University             Pre-semester LCSL Orientation  More information coming soon!             Certificate Program  More information coming soon!             Workshops and Drop-Ins  Weekly workshops for instructors              For Instructors           Professional Development     LCSL 505: Teaching Professional Development Workshop    Chicago Language Symposium     2019 Chicago Language Symposium      Pre-semester LCSL Orientation    Certificate Program      Instructor Resources     Blackboard Help    Google Apps, Video Editing, and More!    Instructor Workshops & Drop In Hours    LCLC Newsletter    Equipment For Instructors    Language Oasis (GH 308)     Reserving GH 308        COVID-19 Resources             For Instructors  Learn about how LCLC can help you with your teaching and events! We offer all sorts of technology help, workshops, and professional development. See details here!      Peer Tutoring  Find out more about our Peer Tutoring program, meet the tutors, and view schedules for Spanish, Italian, French, and German Peer Tutoring in GH 305 & GH 308!      Today's Events  See what Conversations Hours, Film Series, and special events are happening today in GH 308!      Contact Us  Do you want to schedule an event in the Language Oasis? Do you need help with a technology tool or want to schedule a workshop? Contact us with any questions you may have!
